anime.description: In 1973, Japanese artist Keiichi Tanaami made an animated short based on the song written and performed by John Lennon, that can be found on his album Imagine and the greatest hits compilation Working Class Hero: The Definitive Lennon.

tag.name: experimental animation
tag.description: This anime uses distinct, alternative animation — much unlike other contemporary anime — either throughout or in individual episodes/sequences.

tag.name: original in English
tag.description: The anime was originally released with an all or almost all English voice cast, usually in and for an English market.

tag.name: based on real events
tag.description: Contains content based on real-life events. Depending on the creators` wishes those events may have been altered. In the most substantial cases, expect many things to have been changed from the original events.

tag.name: live-action imagery
tag.description: This anime incorporates still images and/or video footage of real-world objects and locations into the animation.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.
